thread.title: Stubblr, the New Mobile Ticket Marketplace, Offers Fans Tickets to TIDALX 10:20 With "You're In" Contest

author: cbs8
title: Stubblr, the New Mobile Ticket Marketplace, Offers Fans Tickets to TIDALX 10:20 With "You're In" Contest
text:
Stubblr
Stubblr, the new mobile ticket marketplace, delights fans with "You're In" event giveaway series sending two winners to TIDALX 10:20 concert featuring Beyonce, Jay-Z, Nicki Minaj and Usher at Barclays Center Oct 20th
BROOKLYN, N.Y., Oct. 15, Stubblr , the new, fan-first is empowering sports, concert and theater ticketing app is rewarding early-adopters with "You're In!", a premiere event giveaway series.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151014/277150
Stubblr -- a location-based mobile ticket marketplace -- is celebrating its launch in the App Store with a series of giveaways including tickets to the Mets NLDS playoffs at Citi Field, and premiere seats at the upcoming TIDALX 10:20 concert October 20th at Barclays Center, featuring Beyonce, Jay-Z, Nicki Minaj, Usher and more.
Stubblr's first "You're In!" winner, Kyle Boris of NJ, was awarded tickets to last-Monday night's coveted NY Mets NLDS faceoff with the LA Dodgers at CitiField. Tickets were presented by Stubblr Co-Founders Paul Yankowitz and Steven Rosenberg .
Said Yankowitz: "We've been thrilled that fans are embracing Stubblr as the new, fast and fair way to find, buy and sell tickets. As avid sports and concert-goers, Steve and I wanted to reward new users with special opportunities to attend some of the most sought-after events coming up this Fall."
To enter, fans simply download Stubblr's free app and post a request for their desired contest event â€“ no purchase necessary.
Upcoming Stubblr "You're In" opportunities include:
October 20th: TIDALX 10:20
Broadway fans with a new mobile ticketing app that transforms the way users find, buy and sell and tickets.
The Stubblr app for iOS combines geo-location and social components to help fans safely and easily find buyers and sellers of last-minute tickets near their location, in real-time.
The game-changing, mobile-first app is made by fans, for fans. Stubblr was developed by avid sports and live music fans, Co-Founders Steven Rosenberg and Paul Yankowitz .
Rosenberg said: "Paul and I were tired of the practices and limitations of online ticketing platforms and having to deal with scalpers. We knew there had to be a better way, and thought we could combine the immediacy and transparency of apps like Uber and Airbnb to create a mobile-first ticketing platform."
Yankowitz added: "Our vision for Stubblr is to tear down the barriers established by traditional marketplaces, and create a safe environment that empowers buyers and sellers to transact directly in real-time."
Users are already embracing the new approach, awarding Stubblr with dozens of 5-star reviews in the App store.
STUBBLR FEATURES
Post ticket requests and deals Find buyers and sellers around you with geo location Instantly chat with users to negotiate and transact Social profiles for verification Digital payments and buyer ticket validation Download Stubblr from the App Store: http://bit.ly/stubblr Web site: stubblr.com
Facebook: /stubblr
Twitter: @Stubblr
Instagram: @Stubblr_App
Press Contact : Nikke Slight, nikke@app-promo.com 1-917-971-7169
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/stubblr-the-new-mobile-ticket-marketplace-offers-fans-tickets-to-tidalx-1020-with-youre-in-contest-300160246.html
